page.title: 03**********Shopping.*********
page.content:
When my family and I go shoping we go into Derby we used to live there but some times we go to to Mickelover. In Mickleover there are shops and big super markets. In Pickwell where we live now there are NO shops. The nearest shop is in Somerby it is a post office and it does'nt sell everything like a super market. We usualy go shopping on a Monday or Tuesday. My Mum shops in Somerby to buy stamps paper and sweets but she does most of her shopping in Melton Mowbray where there is a market and where the banks are.
{Written by Christopher Smith aged 9yrs}
